QuestData.Title: First Assault
QuestData.Description: Now that we have had time to assess our enemies' weaknesses, it is time for us to deal the yaungol a direct blow.$B$BGo and confront the Osul Sharphorn up the mesa to the west.$B$BLet them know that we are here, and that we are not scared of their threats.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. I hope you showed those cretins no mercy.
